title: Five Number Summary: Keeping Up with the Statistics
question_text:
The publicity agency for a famous family tracks how many retweets each tweet receives. All tweets from May 4th to October 3rd were analyzed. The amount of retweets (in thousands) is summarized below.
MinimumQ$_1$MedianQ$_3$Maximum
@Chloe47547282103
@Cylie45778391105
@Cendall32376695256


Which statement is true?

choices.text: One or more tweets by @Chloe are potential outliers.
One or more tweets by @Cylie are potential outliers.
One or more tweets by @Cendall are potential outliers.
One or more tweets by both @Cylie and @Cendall are potential outliers.
